backend/main.mo: Main canister defining authorization, storage mixins, and comprehensive types for repairs, assistance requests, verification, insurance, disputes, memberships, and mechanic/garage data models.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old assistance requests by adding an assignedMechanic field while preserving existing state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend components and pages for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining OKLCH color variables and theme styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration defining routes, layout, navigation, admin tools, dashboards, and feature pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Component that checks admin status and redirects non-admin users while showing a loading skeleton when necessary.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and automatic re-authentication handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter name, optional email, and select roles before saving their profile.
frontend/src/components/booking/GarageBo: Garage booking flow with tabs for details, assistance, and payment, handling auth, waiver signing, and booking creation.
frontend/src/components/booking/Mechanic: UI card allowing users to request mechanic assistance and specify service type and details.
frontend/src/components/booking/PricingB: Displays itemized pricing including base rate, addons, discounts, and final total.
frontend/src/components/coming-soon/Comi: Small badge component indicating that a feature is coming soon.
frontend/src/components/coming-soon/Simu: Simulated step-by-step flow modal with progress tracking and a completion screen for upcoming features.
frontend/src/components/common/Typograph: Exports styled page and section title components for consistent typography.
frontend/src/components/diy/DIYSupportMo: Authenticated modal offering tabs for tool recommendations, cost estimation, and consultation preview.
frontend/src/components/diy/RepairCostEs: Form for creating repair cost estimates and saving them using backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/diy/ToolRecommen: UI for selecting a repair category and displaying recommended tools and consumables, with save-to-session support.
frontend/src/components/diy/VideoConsult: Displays a coming‑soon video consultation feature with pricing, included features, and a simulated booking flow.
frontend/src/components/garages/GarageCa: Clickable garage listing card showing location, rates, and available tools, navigating to the garage detail page.
frontend/src/components/garages/GarageFi: Form controls for filtering garages by location, price range, and requirements such as deposits or waivers.
frontend/src/components/garages/GaragePh: Photo grid and modal viewer for garage images with next/previous navigation and placeholder fallback.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Simple layout wrapper applying container width and padding based on a configurable maxWidth.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar with links, authentication handling, user menu, admin options, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/mechanics/Mechan: Clickable mechanic card showing name, location, rate, rating, and specialization with verification badges.
Filter panel allowing users to filter mechanics by location, specialization, rate range, and verification status.
Displays a colored badge showing a mechanic’s verification status using icons for verified, pending, or rejected.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Renders a dropdown showing recent notifications, unread count, icons, timestamps, and navigation to the notifications page.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Shows the active payment method, emphasizing test-mode escrow processing with descriptive UI elements.
frontend/src/components/payments/Transac: Displays a table of transactions with amounts, fees, status badges, and formatted timestamps, or an empty state if none exist.
Maps transaction status values to badge variants and labels for display.
frontend/src/components/reviews/ReviewLi: Shows a list of reviews with star ratings, comments, and dates, or an empty state with optional average rating.
frontend/src/components/uploads/FileUplo: Provides a file upload UI with validation, progress simulation, limits, and callback handling.
frontend/src/components/waivers/WaiverSi: Modal for reading and electronically signing a liability waiver with name input and agreement checkbox.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Implements React Query hooks for fetching and updating user notifications, currently using placeholder backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines numerous React Query hooks for interacting with actor-based backend APIs for profiles, tools, estimates, and related entities.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Contains TypeScript interfaces and enums for garage, mechanic, booking, transaction, notification, and revenue domain models.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: Renders an access denied page with messaging and a link back home.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DemandHeatmap.t: Shows an admin page placeholder for demand heatmap data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DisputeTools.ts: Displays an admin page placeholder for dispute resolution tools.
frontend/src/pages/admin/EscrowTransacti: Admin page listing escrow transactions with filtering and actions to release or refund funds.
frontend/src/pages/admin/FeaturedBoostMa: Admin page showing pending featured boost requests, currently empty.
frontend/src/pages/admin/InsuranceReview: Admin page for reviewing insurance documents, currently with no pending items.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MarketplaceMode: Admin moderation page for mechanics and garages, both showing no pending reviews.
frontend/src/pages/admin/NoShowPenalties: Admin page displaying recorded no‑show penalties, currently none.
frontend/src/pages/admin/RevenueTracking: Admin dashboard showing revenue totals, breakdowns, and fee configuration.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ReviewModeratio: Admin page for moderating mechanic and garage reviews, currently empty.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserRoleManagem: Displays role descriptions and notes that admin roles cannot be self‑assigned.
frontend/src/pages/admin/VerificationQue: Admin interface to approve or reject identity verification requests with optional notes.
frontend/src/pages/admin/WaitlistManagem: Admin page for viewing waitlist entries, currently none.
frontend/src/pages/admin/WaiverRecords.t: Admin page listing waiver records, currently empty.
frontend/src/pages/coming-soon/Unsupport: Shows upcoming features and allows previewing simulated flows for each.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Renders an admin dashboard with cards linking to various moderation and management tools using a list of tool definitions.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/CustomerDa: Displays customer bookings, pending reviews, and recent transactions, with sign‑in gating when identity is missing.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/GarageOwne: Shows garage owners their listings, availability, and requests, or prompts them to create a listing if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/MechanicDa: Provides mechanics with profile management, availability, incoming requests, and emergency service controls, or prompts them to create a profile.
frontend/src/pages/disputes/Disputes.tsx: Allows users to view and open disputes, including a dialog form for submitting booking IDs and reasons with authentication gating.
frontend/src/pages/fix-my-car/FixMyCarIn: Collects issue descriptions and media uploads for a car‑repair intake flow and navigates to results after submission.
frontend/src/pages/fix-my-car/FixMyCarRe: Displays recommended repair cost and options to browse mechanics or DIY garages.
Provides filters and tabbed list/map views for browsing rentable garages.
Shows detailed garage info including photos, tools, status, and booking/DIY support modals.
frontend/src/pages/garages/GarageListing: Placeholder page for an upcoming garage listing editor.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Implements the marketing-focused landing page with hero content, features, and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/mechanics/MechanicBro: Displays searchable, filterable list of mechanics with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/mechanics/MechanicPro: Placeholder page for editing a mechanic’s profile.
Simple public view showing a mechanic’s profile by ID with a back link.
frontend/src/pages/notifications/Notific: Displays user notifications with filtering, icons, and mark-as-read actions.
frontend/src/pages/payments/TransactionH: Shows authenticated users their transaction and escrow history with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/settings/MembershipSe: Allows users to view and manage DIY and Pro membership statuses and benefits.
frontend/src/pages/trust-safety/Identity: React page showing identity verification status, prompting login if unauthenticated and allowing document upload if logged in.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the app’s architecture, requirements, known issues, and implemented features for a vehicle-services marketplace.
